title: VIRTUAL FAX
subTitle: Receive fax by email, wherever you want

header.title: Save Money
header.content: Get rid of the expensive bill but not the fax number and keep your same fax number.

header.title: Save Space
header.content: you no longer need space for a physical fax machine. Keep your fax numbers and receive faxes via email.

header.title: Easily Change Locations
header.content: wherever you move or travel to, you can keep your fax number and never miss a single document

faxForwardList.title: Virtualize your fax number
faxForwardList.content: Transfer your fax line from any carrier to save money on your monthly bills, while keeping the number you need.

faxForwardList.title: Receive Faxes to Email
faxForwardList.content: Get all your faxes to your inbox as pdf attachments.

faxForwardList.title: Send Faxes from Email
faxForwardList.content: Send all your faxes using your existing email. No one will know the difference in your fax service.

whatIsVirtualFaxNum.title: What is a Virtual Fax number?
whatIsVirtualFaxNum.description:
Keep your existing fax number(s) and have them forwarded to the email addresses of your choice. It is excellent way to save money on your monthly bills. It is also a great option if you are moving to a different location or working remotely. It is also a great solution for businesses who get just a few faxes and don’t want to deal with the hassle or expense of an actual fax machine.
A Virtual Fax service from Tridacom IT Solutions takes faxing to a whole new level. No more paper, toner, or phone lines needed to send or receive faxes.

items.content: Fax from your phone, PC or Mac

virtualNumTypes.title: Keep your existing Fax Number
virtualNumTypes.content: You don’t have to give up your long-established number when you switch to us.

virtualNumTypes.title: Local & Toll Free
virtualNumTypes.content: A local fax number from Tridacom allows you to have a presence in the communities you serve that your business is a part of the community.

virtualNumTypes.title: No Hardware or Software
virtualNumTypes.content: No software is needed. Faxes are delivered right to your email as PDFs.

virtualNumTypes.title: Direct to different emails
virtualNumTypes.content: Send and receive faxes from your eFax number from up to 5 email accounts.

virtualNumTypes.title: Save Money
virtualNumTypes.content: No more fax machines, paper, toner and maintenance costs

virtualNumTypes.title: Secure Faxing
virtualNumTypes.content: Keep your faxes private by sending them directly to your email account instead of laying around on a public fax machine.
